EmailTemplate.name: Shell Credit Direct Debit Daily
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Shell Fuel Card Account Has Been Approved - Additional Information Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations! You have been approved for our Direct Debit Program on your Shell Fuel Card.
With this plan, we simply debit your fleet program balance directly from your checking account daily for the previous day’s transactions.
You will need to complete the attached form to get set up on Direct Debit. Please take a few moments to fill this out and then either scan/email it to me at the email address noted belowor fax it back to me at {!User.Fax}. Please be sure to include a voided check.
Once I receive the completed form, I will call you to verify the setup of your account prior to issuing your cards. Meanwhile, please feel free to give me a call if you have any questions.
Thank you for choosing the Shell Fuel Card Program.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
